title: Pixel 2 Updated to Android 10, Google bar Black
content:
Updated to Android 10 last night and played around with new settings.
Toggled Dark Theme on & off and now the Google search bar at the bottom is only showing as black.
I've been into the Google settings and reverting to default, but the change doesn't take effect - the search launcher still shows as black.
Is this a known bug? or am i missing something?


Thanks
